diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Thoracic aortic aneurysm due to PRKG1 mutation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient has a known PRKG1 heterozygous mutation and a strong family history of thoracic aortic aneurysms and dissections, supporting early intervention. Intraoperative findings revealed an exceptionally thin aortic wall and significant familial patterns of aortic dissections, which indicated a need for aggressive prophylactic surgical management.
